website_summaries.verdict: The Canon PowerShot SX530 HS is a fairly compact superzoom camera with a 50x zoom lens, but it can be slow to focus when zoomed in all the way.
cons: Can be slow to lock focus when zoomed

customer_reviews.title: Good general camera wit a very good zoom lens
customer_reviews.text: Good general camera wit a very good zoom lens. Works surprisingly well in low light. More of a point and shoot camera rather than a full DSLR camera, but is smaller and easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy J Poppleton

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to transfer photos to computer or tablet.
customer_reviews.text: Light and easy to use. Big downside is that the camera does not come with a download lead and the Wi-fi features do not work on both my iPad IOS and computer Windows 10,despite the most up to date software, hardware and apps. Can only download via. Card reader. Poor instructions on this and not much support.
customer_reviews.author: Hillcollector99

customer_reviews.title: Ideal
customer_reviews.text: Love it. An updated version of my last camera. No manual included though so can't work out how to use it wirelessly. Superb zoom.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs A Rigg

customer_reviews.title: Great camera that is easy to use for the beginne
customer_reviews.text: Great camera that is easy to use for the beginner. Recommended
customer_reviews.author: Mr. I. G. Cain

customer_reviews.title: Good enough... for now
customer_reviews.text: I'm still trying to get accustomed to the camera. I'm more familiar with analogue cameras and using this on the manual setting was reasonably okay. The photos were not as sharp as I wanted, but that may be down to my unfamiliarity with the item. I'm taking it to Whitby to give it a proper workout lol!
customer_reviews.author: M. A. Perry

customer_reviews.title: Great zoom and photo quality but hard to make it do some things
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant zoom, takes good photos, need to read the manual to make it do some things. For example, manual focus is very hard to do.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Lockwood

customer_reviews.title: ... replacement for my 15 year old Powershot G5 - amazing little camera does all I need and more
customer_reviews.text: A replacement for my 15 year old Powershot G5 - amazing little camera does all I need and more.
customer_reviews.author: Mr M R Green

customer_reviews.title: The best !
customer_reviews.text: Best camera I have ever had. I have bought two now as they are so good. (One as a gift). The zoom is amazing. My husband has taken detailed pictures of the moon with it!
customer_reviews.author: Susan `.

customer_reviews.title: Cannon camera
customer_reviews.text: The camera is super very simple to use light and small enough to carry even fits under your coat if raining takes love Sharp pictures can magnify it really well
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Im amazed. Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic. Basically brand new even though bought used. Came with instructions manual, charger for the battery, strap, everything in perfect condition and had a 64gb card inside already. Which means endless memory along with the additional 128gb sd card i bought. Pictures are crystal clear and its fairly easy to use once you play with it a little. Im amazed
customer_reviews.author: Magdalena G.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera
customer_reviews.text: Amazing camera for the price. Took it to south Africa and got some amazing animal photographs. Great half way point between amateur and professional cameras. That 50x zoom is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: First camera, had it around 2 months now and I love it. Very easy to use and highly recommended for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Jane Fraser

customer_reviews.title: Getting amazing pics
customer_reviews.text: Automatic mode is easy.. now learning the harder and better manual way
customer_reviews.author: John Chewter

customer_reviews.title: Working well
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly & in good condition. I am still working away at the mammoth instruction manual. All working well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice one !
customer_reviews.text: I like it ! Most people seem to click away on their phones nowadays .... why not get back to a good simple digital camera that looks like the real thing !!
customer_reviews.author: Mr Douglas Turnbull

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera, photos amazing resolution, easy to use and wifi connectivity.
customer_reviews.author: deborah whiteside

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Does all it says and for the price a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: martyn gannon

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the zoom quality and the image stability functions. Photographs are crisp and without distortion. Ideal size for the holiday it has been bought for.
customer_reviews.author: H. C. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! Very pleased with this as it is easy ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Very pleased with this as it is easy to use and takes amazing photographs. Particularly happy with the anti shake as it is sometimes difficult to control in windy conditions, Would definitely recommend this product and this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Robert N. Pritchard

customer_reviews.title: nice camera
customer_reviews.text: so far so good but would have liked a nice compact manual rather than the reams and reams of paper I had to print off with such small print it's hard to read. When I finally get to grips with the instructions I hope to enjoy using it for summer to come!
customer_reviews.author: j farrell

customer_reviews.title: worked fine for a few weeks and the lens has jammed ...
customer_reviews.text: First one arrived and did not work at all, replacement arrived, worked fine for a few weeks and the lens has jammed rendering the camera useless 4 days outside of Amazons return window. ARRRRGGHHH
customer_reviews.author: David Powell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, does everything it needs to do, great value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Davies

customer_reviews.title: Takes good pictures and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: A good camera, easy to use and takes great pictures. I wanted to take better pictures using the zoom and this does snap good pictures from a distance and close up. It's lightweight and isn't too lumpy to carry around. It hasn't come with any guarantee (something on a paper in a foreign language which could be it but nothing in a European language to decipher). Does have a very basic instruction booklet but would need to go online to find out the full details of using the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy S

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I can take nice pics with it but can't focus on anything and it's very slow. I always miss the the action because it's just too slow to clear up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great camera with high zoom and minimum operation knowledge needed to use.
customer_reviews.author: Galib Khan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing  camera
customer_reviews.text: An amazing camera to start but also powerful! The zoom is amazing you can take clear shot of the moon ! And full HD 60 fps video ! Battery is good 1 hour full hd video until need charge again ! Fully charge in 2 hours
customer_reviews.author: IOANNIS KALOGEROPOULOS

customer_reviews.title: Totally disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a surprise present, totally disappointed as it didn't even turn on. Found finger prints all over the view finder!! Returning for a refund
customer_reviews.author: g b wright

product_meta.title: Canon PowerShot SX540HS Digital Camera
product_meta.description: Effortless fun and expert control combine in this 50x zoom, connected bridge camera that takes you on an imaging journey to create and share stunning photos and movies. Ideal for holidays and special occasions. Get closer to distant detail or fit more in the scene using the huge 50x optical zoom with 24mm ultra-wide angle. Enjoy crisp, clear shots in any light thanks to a 20.3 Megapixels CMOS sensor and powerful DIGIC 6 processor and capture spontaneous action with 0.13 s autofocus and fast 5.9 fps sustaine
feature_bullets: Get closer or shoot ultra-wide with 24 mm, 50x optical zoom, high quality shots in any light and capture spontaneous action
Shoot realistic Full HD 60p movies and keep footage steady at full zoom or running with Advanced Dynamic Image Stabiliser
With Wi-Fi, NFC and Image Sync it's simple to connect to your smart device, shoot remotely and share or back up your creations
Just point and shoot with Hybrid Auto and Creative Shot for high results or take full creative control
Enjoy steadier shots and comfortable shooting with the ergonomic grip and easily keep track of subjects with Zoom Framing Assist

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars45 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
